author: robocopsgonemad
content: the topic of SSZ on the EL has come up again, via EIP-7928. I don't think it is necessary for BAL, and I appreciate the desperation to get some kind of motion on updating the serialization of the EL.

author: robocopsgonemad
content: it's a big topic for discussion, it seems to die off because it is a lot of risk for questionable reward, but then it pops up now and again.

author: robocopsgonemad
content: generally i'm in favor of incremental techdebt payoff, but it is hard for me to imagine a world where we release partial serialization improvements incrementally as "ride along" EIPs in a series of hardforks. It becomes a 5 year mission.
